alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 24 at 3:10AM PDT until April 24 at 12:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PDT TODAY... * WHAT...North to northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Los Angeles County Mountains and Ventura County Mountains. * WHEN...Until noon PDT today. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Roadways may be affected by gusty cross winds. This includes Highway 33 in Ventura County as well as Interstate 5 and Highway 14 in Los Angeles County. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Mountains; Ventura County Mountains
